title: A central composite design-based targeted quercetin nanoliposomal formulation: Optimization and cytotoxic studies on MCF-7 breast cancer cell lines

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): E. Bhargav, Nawaz Mohammed, Udit Narayan Singh, P. Ramalingam, Ranadheer Reddy Challa, Bhaskar Vallamkonda, Sheikh F. Ahmad, Prasanth DSNBK, Praveen Kumar Pasala, Mithun Rudrapal
